00016 static int __cdecl SortModesCallback( const void* arg1, const void* arg2 );
00017 UINT DXUTStencilBits( D3DFORMAT fmt );

00019 UINT DXUTAlphaChannelBits( D3DFORMAT fmt );

00021 CD3DEnumeration* DXUTGetEnumeration()
00022 {
00023     // Using an accessor function gives control of the construction order
00024     static CD3DEnumeration d3denum;
00025     return &d3denum;
00026 }

00029 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00030 CD3DEnumeration::CD3DEnumeration()
00031 {
00032     m_pD3D = NULL;
00033     m_IsDeviceAcceptableFunc = NULL;
00034     m_pIsDeviceAcceptableFuncUserContext = NULL;
00035     m_bRequirePostPixelShaderBlending = true;
00036 
00037     m_nMinWidth = 0;
00038     m_nMinHeight = 0;
00039     m_nMaxWidth = UINT_MAX;
00040     m_nMaxHeight = UINT_MAX;
00041 
00042     m_nRefreshMin = 0;
00043     m_nRefreshMax = UINT_MAX;
00044 
00045     m_nMultisampleQualityMax = 0xFFFF;
00046 
00047     ResetPossibleDepthStencilFormats();
00048     ResetPossibleMultisampleTypeList();                                   
00049     ResetPossiblePresentIntervalList();
00050     SetPossibleVertexProcessingList( true, true, true, false );
00051 }

00062 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00063 // Enumerates available D3D adapters, devices, modes, etc.
00064 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00065 HRESULT CD3DEnumeration::Enumerate( IDirect3D9* pD3D,
00066                                     LPDXUTCALLBACKISDEVICEACCEPTABLE IsDeviceAcceptableFunc,
00067                                     void* pIsDeviceAcceptableFuncUserContext )
00068 {
00069     if( pD3D == NULL )
00070     {
00071         pD3D = DXUTGetD3DObject();
00072         if( pD3D == NULL )
00073             return DXUTERR_NODIRECT3D;
00074     }
00075 
00076     m_pD3D = pD3D;
00077     m_IsDeviceAcceptableFunc = IsDeviceAcceptableFunc;
00078     m_pIsDeviceAcceptableFuncUserContext = pIsDeviceAcceptableFuncUserContext;
00079 
00080     HRESULT hr;
00081     ClearAdapterInfoList();
00082     CGrowableArray<D3DFORMAT> adapterFormatList;
00083 
00084     const D3DFORMAT allowedAdapterFormatArray[] = 
00085     {   
00086         D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8, 
00087         D3DFMT_X1R5G5B5, 
00088         D3DFMT_R5G6B5, 
00089         D3DFMT_A2R10G10B10
00090     };
00091     const UINT allowedAdapterFormatArrayCount  = sizeof(allowedAdapterFormatArray) / sizeof(allowedAdapterFormatArray[0]);
00092 
00093     UINT numAdapters = pD3D->GetAdapterCount();
00094     for (UINT adapterOrdinal = 0; adapterOrdinal < numAdapters; adapterOrdinal++)
00095     {
00096         CD3DEnumAdapterInfo* pAdapterInfo = DX_NEW CD3DEnumAdapterInfo;
00097         if( pAdapterInfo == NULL )
00098             return E_OUTOFMEMORY;
00099 
00100         pAdapterInfo->AdapterOrdinal = adapterOrdinal;
00101         pD3D->GetAdapterIdentifier(adapterOrdinal, 0, &pAdapterInfo->AdapterIdentifier);
00102 
00103         // Get list of all display modes on this adapter.  
00104         // Also build a temporary list of all display adapter formats.
00105         adapterFormatList.RemoveAll();
00106 
00107         for( UINT iFormatList = 0; iFormatList < allowedAdapterFormatArrayCount; iFormatList++ )
00108         {
00109             D3DFORMAT allowedAdapterFormat = allowedAdapterFormatArray[iFormatList];
00110             UINT numAdapterModes = pD3D->GetAdapterModeCount( adapterOrdinal, allowedAdapterFormat );
00111             for (UINT mode = 0; mode < numAdapterModes; mode++)
00112             {
00113                 D3DDISPLAYMODE displayMode;
00114                 pD3D->EnumAdapterModes( adapterOrdinal, allowedAdapterFormat, mode, &displayMode );
00115 
00116                 if( displayMode.Width < m_nMinWidth ||
00117                     displayMode.Height < m_nMinHeight || 
00118                     displayMode.Width > m_nMaxWidth ||
00119                     displayMode.Height > m_nMaxHeight || 
00120                     displayMode.RefreshRate < m_nRefreshMin ||
00121                     displayMode.RefreshRate > m_nRefreshMax )
00122                 {
00123                     continue;
00124                 }
00125 
00126                 pAdapterInfo->displayModeList.Add( displayMode );
00127                 
00128                 if( !adapterFormatList.Contains(displayMode.Format) )
00129                     adapterFormatList.Add( displayMode.Format );
00130             }
00131 
00132         }
00133 
00134         D3DDISPLAYMODE displayMode;
00135         pD3D->GetAdapterDisplayMode( adapterOrdinal, &displayMode );
00136         if( !adapterFormatList.Contains(displayMode.Format) )
00137             adapterFormatList.Add( displayMode.Format );
00138 
00139         // Sort displaymode list
00140         qsort( pAdapterInfo->displayModeList.GetData(), 
00141                pAdapterInfo->displayModeList.GetSize(), sizeof( D3DDISPLAYMODE ),
00142                SortModesCallback );
00143 
00144         // Get info for each device on this adapter
00145         if( FAILED( EnumerateDevices( pAdapterInfo, &adapterFormatList ) ) )
00146         {
00147             delete pAdapterInfo;
00148             continue;
00149         }
00150 
00151         // If at least one device on this adapter is available and compatible
00152         // with the app, add the adapterInfo to the list
00153         if( pAdapterInfo->deviceInfoList.GetSize() > 0 )
00154         {
00155             hr = m_AdapterInfoList.Add( pAdapterInfo );
00156             if( FAILED(hr) )
00157                 return hr;
00158         } else
00159             delete pAdapterInfo;
00160     }
00161 
00162     bool bUniqueDesc = true;
00163     CD3DEnumAdapterInfo* pAdapterInfo;
00164     for( int i=0; i<m_AdapterInfoList.GetSize(); i++ )
00165     {
00166         CD3DEnumAdapterInfo* pAdapterInfo1 = m_AdapterInfoList.GetAt(i);
00167 
00168         for( int j=i+1; j<m_AdapterInfoList.GetSize(); j++ )
00169         {
00170             CD3DEnumAdapterInfo* pAdapterInfo2 = m_AdapterInfoList.GetAt(j);
00171             if( _stricmp( pAdapterInfo1->AdapterIdentifier.Description, 
00172                           pAdapterInfo2->AdapterIdentifier.Description ) == 0 )
00173             {
00174                 bUniqueDesc = false;
00175                 break;
00176             }
00177         }
00178 
00179         if( !bUniqueDesc )
00180             break;
00181     }
00182 
00183     for( int i=0; i<m_AdapterInfoList.GetSize(); i++ )
00184     {
00185         pAdapterInfo = m_AdapterInfoList.GetAt(i);
00186 
00187         MultiByteToWideChar( CP_ACP, 0, 
00188                              pAdapterInfo->AdapterIdentifier.Description, -1, 
00189                              pAdapterInfo->szUniqueDescription, 100 );
00190         pAdapterInfo->szUniqueDescription[100] = 0;
00191 
00192         if( !bUniqueDesc )
00193         {
00194             WCHAR sz[100];
00195             StringCchPrintf( sz, 100, L" (#%d)", pAdapterInfo->AdapterOrdinal );
00196             StringCchCat( pAdapterInfo->szUniqueDescription, 256, sz );
00197 
00198         }
00199     }
00200 
00201     return S_OK;
00202 }
00203

00205 
00206 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00207 // Enumerates D3D devices for a particular adapter.
00208 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00209 HRESULT CD3DEnumeration::EnumerateDevices( CD3DEnumAdapterInfo* pAdapterInfo, CGrowableArray<D3DFORMAT>* pAdapterFormatList )
00210 {
00211     HRESULT hr;
00212 
00213     const D3DDEVTYPE devTypeArray[] = 
00214     { 
00215         D3DDEVTYPE_HAL, 
00216         D3DDEVTYPE_SW, 
00217         D3DDEVTYPE_REF 
00218     };
00219     const UINT devTypeArrayCount = sizeof(devTypeArray) / sizeof(devTypeArray[0]);
00220 
00221     // Enumerate each Direct3D device type
00222     for( UINT iDeviceType = 0; iDeviceType < devTypeArrayCount; iDeviceType++ )
00223     {
00224         CD3DEnumDeviceInfo* pDeviceInfo = DX_NEW CD3DEnumDeviceInfo;
00225         if( pDeviceInfo == NULL )
00226             return E_OUTOFMEMORY;
00227 
00228         // Fill struct w/ AdapterOrdinal and D3DDEVTYPE
00229         pDeviceInfo->DeviceType = devTypeArray[iDeviceType];
00230 
00231         // Store device caps
00232         if( FAILED( hr = m_pD3D->GetDeviceCaps( pAdapterInfo->AdapterOrdinal, pDeviceInfo->DeviceType, 
00233                                               &pDeviceInfo->Caps ) ) )
00234         {
00235             delete pDeviceInfo;
00236             continue;
00237         }
00238 
00239         // Get info for each devicecombo on this device
00240         if( FAILED( hr = EnumerateDeviceCombos( pAdapterInfo, pDeviceInfo, pAdapterFormatList ) ) )
00241         {
00242             delete pDeviceInfo;
00243             continue;
00244         }
00245 
00246         // If at least one devicecombo for this device is found, 
00247         // add the deviceInfo to the list
00248         if (pDeviceInfo->deviceSettingsComboList.GetSize() > 0 )
00249             pAdapterInfo->deviceInfoList.Add( pDeviceInfo );
00250         else
00251             delete pDeviceInfo;
00252     }
00253 
00254     return S_OK;
00255 }
00256 
00257 
00258 
00259 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00260 // Enumerates DeviceCombos for a particular device.
00261 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00262 HRESULT CD3DEnumeration::EnumerateDeviceCombos( CD3DEnumAdapterInfo* pAdapterInfo, CD3DEnumDeviceInfo* pDeviceInfo, CGrowableArray<D3DFORMAT>* pAdapterFormatList )
00263 {
00264     const D3DFORMAT backBufferFormatArray[] = 
00265     {   
00266         D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8, 
00267         D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8, 
00268         D3DFMT_A2R10G10B10, 
00269         D3DFMT_R5G6B5, 
00270         D3DFMT_A1R5G5B5, 
00271         D3DFMT_X1R5G5B5 
00272     };
00273     const UINT backBufferFormatArrayCount = sizeof(backBufferFormatArray) / sizeof(backBufferFormatArray[0]);
00274 
00275     // See which adapter formats are supported by this device
00276     for( int iFormat=0; iFormat<pAdapterFormatList->GetSize(); iFormat++ )
00277     {
00278         D3DFORMAT adapterFormat = pAdapterFormatList->GetAt(iFormat);
00279 
00280         for( UINT iBackBufferFormat = 0; iBackBufferFormat < backBufferFormatArrayCount; iBackBufferFormat++ )
00281         {
00282             D3DFORMAT backBufferFormat = backBufferFormatArray[iBackBufferFormat];
00283 
00284             for( int nWindowed = 0; nWindowed < 2; nWindowed++)
00285             {
00286                 if( !nWindowed && pAdapterInfo->displayModeList.GetSize() == 0 )
00287                     continue;
00288 
00289                 if (FAILED( m_pD3D->CheckDeviceType( pAdapterInfo->AdapterOrdinal, pDeviceInfo->DeviceType, 
00290                                                      adapterFormat, backBufferFormat, nWindowed )))
00291                 {
00292                     continue;
00293                 }
00294 
00295                 if( m_bRequirePostPixelShaderBlending )
00296                 {
00297                     // If the backbuffer format doesn't support D3DUSAGE_QUERY_POSTPIXELSHADER_BLENDING
00298                     // then alpha test, pixel fog, render-target blending, color write enable, and dithering. 
00299                     // are not supported.
00300                     if( FAILED( m_pD3D->CheckDeviceFormat( pAdapterInfo->AdapterOrdinal, pDeviceInfo->DeviceType,
00301                                                         adapterFormat, D3DUSAGE_QUERY_POSTPIXELSHADER_BLENDING, 
00302                                                         D3DRTYPE_TEXTURE, backBufferFormat ) ) )
00303                     {
00304                         continue;
00305                     }
00306                 }
00307 
00308                 // If an application callback function has been provided, make sure this device
00309                 // is acceptable to the app.
00310                 if( m_IsDeviceAcceptableFunc != NULL )
00311                 {
00312                     if( !m_IsDeviceAcceptableFunc( &pDeviceInfo->Caps, adapterFormat, backBufferFormat, FALSE != nWindowed, m_pIsDeviceAcceptableFuncUserContext ) )
00313                         continue;
00314                 }
00315                 
00316                 // At this point, we have an adapter/device/adapterformat/backbufferformat/iswindowed
00317                 // DeviceCombo that is supported by the system and acceptable to the app. We still 
00318                 // need to find one or more suitable depth/stencil buffer format,
00319                 // multisample type, and present interval.
00320                 CD3DEnumDeviceSettingsCombo* pDeviceCombo = DX_NEW CD3DEnumDeviceSettingsCombo;
00321                 if( pDeviceCombo == NULL )
00322                     return E_OUTOFMEMORY;
00323 
00324                 pDeviceCombo->AdapterOrdinal = pAdapterInfo->AdapterOrdinal;
00325                 pDeviceCombo->DeviceType = pDeviceInfo->DeviceType;
00326                 pDeviceCombo->AdapterFormat = adapterFormat;
00327                 pDeviceCombo->BackBufferFormat = backBufferFormat;
00328                 pDeviceCombo->Windowed = (nWindowed != 0);
00329                
00330                 BuildDepthStencilFormatList( pDeviceCombo );
00331                 BuildMultiSampleTypeList( pDeviceCombo );
00332                 if (pDeviceCombo->multiSampleTypeList.GetSize() == 0)
00333                 {
00334                     delete pDeviceCombo;
00335                     continue;
00336                 }
00337                 BuildDSMSConflictList( pDeviceCombo );
00338                 BuildPresentIntervalList(pDeviceInfo, pDeviceCombo );
00339                 pDeviceCombo->pAdapterInfo = pAdapterInfo;
00340                 pDeviceCombo->pDeviceInfo = pDeviceInfo;
00341 
00342                 pDeviceInfo->deviceSettingsComboList.Add( pDeviceCombo );
00343             }
00344         }
00345     }
00346 
00347     return S_OK;
00348 }
00349

00352 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00353 // Adds all depth/stencil formats that are compatible with the device 
00354 //       and app to the given D3DDeviceCombo.
00355 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00356 void CD3DEnumeration::BuildDepthStencilFormatList( CD3DEnumDeviceSettingsCombo* pDeviceCombo )
00357 {
00358     D3DFORMAT depthStencilFmt;
00359     for( int idsf = 0; idsf < m_DepthStecilPossibleList.GetSize(); idsf++ )
00360     {
00361         depthStencilFmt = m_DepthStecilPossibleList.GetAt(idsf);
00362         if (SUCCEEDED(m_pD3D->CheckDeviceFormat(pDeviceCombo->AdapterOrdinal, 
00363                 pDeviceCombo->DeviceType, pDeviceCombo->AdapterFormat, 
00364                 D3DUSAGE_DEPTHSTENCIL, D3DRTYPE_SURFACE, depthStencilFmt)))
00365         {
00366             if (SUCCEEDED(m_pD3D->CheckDepthStencilMatch(pDeviceCombo->AdapterOrdinal, 
00367                     pDeviceCombo->DeviceType, pDeviceCombo->AdapterFormat, 
00368                     pDeviceCombo->BackBufferFormat, depthStencilFmt)))
00369             {
00370                 pDeviceCombo->depthStencilFormatList.Add( depthStencilFmt );
00371             }
00372         }
00373     }
00374 }
00375

00379 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00380 // Adds all multisample types that are compatible with the device and app to
00381 //       the given D3DDeviceCombo.
00382 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00383 void CD3DEnumeration::BuildMultiSampleTypeList( CD3DEnumDeviceSettingsCombo* pDeviceCombo )
00384 {
00385     D3DMULTISAMPLE_TYPE msType;
00386     DWORD msQuality;
00387     for( int imst = 0; imst < m_MultiSampleTypeList.GetSize(); imst++ )
00388     {
00389         msType = m_MultiSampleTypeList.GetAt(imst);
00390         if( SUCCEEDED( m_pD3D->CheckDeviceMultiSampleType( pDeviceCombo->AdapterOrdinal, 
00391                 pDeviceCombo->DeviceType, pDeviceCombo->BackBufferFormat, 
00392                 pDeviceCombo->Windowed, msType, &msQuality ) ) )
00393         {
00394             pDeviceCombo->multiSampleTypeList.Add( msType );
00395             if( msQuality > m_nMultisampleQualityMax+1 )
00396                 msQuality = m_nMultisampleQualityMax+1;
00397             pDeviceCombo->multiSampleQualityList.Add( msQuality );
00398         }
00399     }
00400 }
00401

00404 
00405 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00406 // Find any conflicts between the available depth/stencil formats and
00407 //       multisample types.
00408 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00409 void CD3DEnumeration::BuildDSMSConflictList( CD3DEnumDeviceSettingsCombo* pDeviceCombo )
00410 {
00411     CD3DEnumDSMSConflict DSMSConflict;
00412 
00413     for( int iDS=0; iDS<pDeviceCombo->depthStencilFormatList.GetSize(); iDS++ )
00414     {
00415         D3DFORMAT dsFmt = pDeviceCombo->depthStencilFormatList.GetAt(iDS);
00416 
00417         for( int iMS=0; iMS<pDeviceCombo->multiSampleTypeList.GetSize(); iMS++ )
00418         {
00419             D3DMULTISAMPLE_TYPE msType = pDeviceCombo->multiSampleTypeList.GetAt(iMS);
00420 
00421             if( FAILED( m_pD3D->CheckDeviceMultiSampleType( pDeviceCombo->AdapterOrdinal, pDeviceCombo->DeviceType,
00422                                                             dsFmt, pDeviceCombo->Windowed, msType, NULL ) ) )
00423             {
00424                 DSMSConflict.DSFormat = dsFmt;
00425                 DSMSConflict.MSType = msType;
00426                 pDeviceCombo->DSMSConflictList.Add( DSMSConflict );
00427             }
00428         }
00429     }
00430 }

00434 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00435 // Adds all present intervals that are compatible with the device and app 
00436 //       to the given D3DDeviceCombo.
00437 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00438 void CD3DEnumeration::BuildPresentIntervalList( CD3DEnumDeviceInfo* pDeviceInfo, 
00439                                                 CD3DEnumDeviceSettingsCombo* pDeviceCombo )
00440 {
00441     UINT pi;
00442     for( int ipi = 0; ipi < m_PresentIntervalList.GetSize(); ipi++ )
00443     {
00444         pi = m_PresentIntervalList.GetAt(ipi);
00445         if( pDeviceCombo->Windowed )
00446         {
00447             if( pi == D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_TWO ||
00448                 pi == D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_THREE ||
00449                 pi == D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_FOUR )
00450             {
00451                 // These intervals are not supported in windowed mode.
00452                 continue;
00453             }
00454         }
00455         // Note that D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_DEFAULT is zero, so you
00456         // can't do a caps check for it -- it is always available.
00457         if( pi == D3DPRESENT_INTERVAL_DEFAULT ||
00458             (pDeviceInfo->Caps.PresentationIntervals & pi) )
00459         {
00460             pDeviceCombo->presentIntervalList.Add( pi );
00461         }
00462     }
00463 }

00467 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00468 // Release all the allocated CD3DEnumAdapterInfo objects and empty the list
00469 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00470 void CD3DEnumeration::ClearAdapterInfoList()
00471 {
00472     CD3DEnumAdapterInfo* pAdapterInfo;
00473     for( int i=0; i<m_AdapterInfoList.GetSize(); i++ )
00474     {
00475         pAdapterInfo = m_AdapterInfoList.GetAt(i);
00476         delete pAdapterInfo;
00477     }
00478 
00479     m_AdapterInfoList.RemoveAll();
00480 }
00481

00484 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00485 // Call GetAdapterInfoList() after Enumerate() to get a STL vector of 
00486 //       CD3DEnumAdapterInfo* 
00487 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00488 CGrowableArray<CD3DEnumAdapterInfo*>* CD3DEnumeration::GetAdapterInfoList()
00489 {
00490     return &m_AdapterInfoList;
00491 }

00495 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00496 CD3DEnumAdapterInfo* CD3DEnumeration::GetAdapterInfo( UINT AdapterOrdinal )
00497 {
00498     for( int iAdapter=0; iAdapter<m_AdapterInfoList.GetSize(); iAdapter++ )
00499     {
00500         CD3DEnumAdapterInfo* pAdapterInfo = m_AdapterInfoList.GetAt(iAdapter);
00501         if( pAdapterInfo->AdapterOrdinal == AdapterOrdinal )
00502             return pAdapterInfo;
00503     }
00504 
00505     return NULL;
00506 }
00507 
00508 
00509 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00510 CD3DEnumDeviceInfo* CD3DEnumeration::GetDeviceInfo( UINT AdapterOrdinal, D3DDEVTYPE DeviceType )
00511 {
00512     CD3DEnumAdapterInfo* pAdapterInfo = GetAdapterInfo( AdapterOrdinal );
00513     if( pAdapterInfo )
00514     {
00515         for( int iDeviceInfo=0; iDeviceInfo<pAdapterInfo->deviceInfoList.GetSize(); iDeviceInfo++ )
00516         {
00517             CD3DEnumDeviceInfo* pDeviceInfo = pAdapterInfo->deviceInfoList.GetAt(iDeviceInfo);
00518             if( pDeviceInfo->DeviceType == DeviceType )
00519                 return pDeviceInfo;
00520         }
00521     }
00522 
00523     return NULL;
00524 }
00525 
00526 
00527 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00528 // 
00529 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00530 CD3DEnumDeviceSettingsCombo* CD3DEnumeration::GetDeviceSettingsCombo( UINT AdapterOrdinal, D3DDEVTYPE DeviceType, D3DFORMAT AdapterFormat, D3DFORMAT BackBufferFormat, BOOL bWindowed )
00531 {
00532     CD3DEnumDeviceInfo* pDeviceInfo = GetDeviceInfo( AdapterOrdinal, DeviceType );
00533     if( pDeviceInfo )
00534     {
00535         for( int iDeviceCombo=0; iDeviceCombo<pDeviceInfo->deviceSettingsComboList.GetSize(); iDeviceCombo++ )
00536         {
00537             CD3DEnumDeviceSettingsCombo* pDeviceSettingsCombo = pDeviceInfo->deviceSettingsComboList.GetAt(iDeviceCombo);
00538             if( pDeviceSettingsCombo->AdapterFormat == AdapterFormat &&
00539                 pDeviceSettingsCombo->BackBufferFormat == BackBufferFormat &&
00540                 pDeviceSettingsCombo->Windowed == bWindowed )
00541                 return pDeviceSettingsCombo;
00542         }
00543     }
00544 
00545     return NULL;
00546 }

00549 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00550 // Returns the number of color channel bits in the specified D3DFORMAT
00551 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00552 UINT DXUTColorChannelBits( D3DFORMAT fmt )
00553 {
00554     switch( fmt )
00555     {
00556         case D3DFMT_R8G8B8:
00557             return 8;
00558         case D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8:
00559             return 8;
00560         case D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8:
00561             return 8;
00562         case D3DFMT_R5G6B5:
00563             return 5;
00564         case D3DFMT_X1R5G5B5:
00565             return 5;
00566         case D3DFMT_A1R5G5B5:
00567             return 5;
00568         case D3DFMT_A4R4G4B4:
00569             return 4;
00570         case D3DFMT_R3G3B2:
00571             return 2;
00572         case D3DFMT_A8R3G3B2:
00573             return 2;
00574         case D3DFMT_X4R4G4B4:
00575             return 4;
00576         case D3DFMT_A2B10G10R10:
00577             return 10;
00578         case D3DFMT_A8B8G8R8:
00579             return 8;
00580         case D3DFMT_A2R10G10B10:
00581             return 10;
00582         case D3DFMT_A16B16G16R16:
00583             return 16;
00584         default:
00585             return 0;
00586     }
00587 }
00588

00592 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00593 // Returns the number of alpha channel bits in the specified D3DFORMAT
00594 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00595 UINT DXUTAlphaChannelBits( D3DFORMAT fmt )
00596 {
00597     switch( fmt )
00598     {
00599         case D3DFMT_R8G8B8:
00600             return 0;
00601         case D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8:
00602             return 8;
00603         case D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8:
00604             return 0;
00605         case D3DFMT_R5G6B5:
00606             return 0;
00607         case D3DFMT_X1R5G5B5:
00608             return 0;
00609         case D3DFMT_A1R5G5B5:
00610             return 1;
00611         case D3DFMT_A4R4G4B4:
00612             return 4;
00613         case D3DFMT_R3G3B2:
00614             return 0;
00615         case D3DFMT_A8R3G3B2:
00616             return 8;
00617         case D3DFMT_X4R4G4B4:
00618             return 0;
00619         case D3DFMT_A2B10G10R10:
00620             return 2;
00621         case D3DFMT_A8B8G8R8:
00622             return 8;
00623         case D3DFMT_A2R10G10B10:
00624             return 2;
00625         case D3DFMT_A16B16G16R16:
00626             return 16;
00627         default:
00628             return 0;
00629     }
00630 }

00635 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00636 // Returns the number of depth bits in the specified D3DFORMAT
00637 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00638 UINT DXUTDepthBits( D3DFORMAT fmt )
00639 {
00640     switch( fmt )
00641     {
00642         case D3DFMT_D32F_LOCKABLE:
00643         case D3DFMT_D32:
00644             return 32;
00645 
00646         case D3DFMT_D24X8:
00647         case D3DFMT_D24S8:
00648         case D3DFMT_D24X4S4:
00649         case D3DFMT_D24FS8:
00650             return 24;
00651 
00652         case D3DFMT_D16_LOCKABLE:
00653         case D3DFMT_D16:
00654             return 16;
00655 
00656         case D3DFMT_D15S1:
00657             return 15;
00658 
00659         default:
00660             return 0;
00661     }
00662 }
00663 
00664 
00665 
00666 
00667 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00668 // Returns the number of stencil bits in the specified D3DFORMAT
00669 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00670 UINT DXUTStencilBits( D3DFORMAT fmt )
00671 {
00672     switch( fmt )
00673     {
00674         case D3DFMT_D16_LOCKABLE:
00675         case D3DFMT_D16:
00676         case D3DFMT_D32F_LOCKABLE:
00677         case D3DFMT_D32:
00678         case D3DFMT_D24X8:
00679             return 0;
00680 
00681         case D3DFMT_D15S1:
00682             return 1;
00683 
00684         case D3DFMT_D24X4S4:
00685             return 4;
00686 
00687         case D3DFMT_D24S8:
00688         case D3DFMT_D24FS8:
00689             return 8;
00690 
00691         default:
00692             return 0;
00693     }
00694 }

00697 
00698 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00699 // Used to sort D3DDISPLAYMODEs
00700 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00701 static int __cdecl SortModesCallback( const void* arg1, const void* arg2 )
00702 {
00703     D3DDISPLAYMODE* pdm1 = (D3DDISPLAYMODE*)arg1;
00704     D3DDISPLAYMODE* pdm2 = (D3DDISPLAYMODE*)arg2;
00705 
00706     if (pdm1->Width > pdm2->Width)
00707         return 1;
00708     if (pdm1->Width < pdm2->Width)
00709         return -1;
00710     if (pdm1->Height > pdm2->Height)
00711         return 1;
00712     if (pdm1->Height < pdm2->Height)
00713         return -1;
00714     if (pdm1->Format > pdm2->Format)
00715         return 1;
00716     if (pdm1->Format < pdm2->Format)
00717         return -1;
00718     if (pdm1->RefreshRate > pdm2->RefreshRate)
00719         return 1;
00720     if (pdm1->RefreshRate < pdm2->RefreshRate)
00721         return -1;
00722     return 0;
00723 }

00727 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00728 CD3DEnumAdapterInfo::~CD3DEnumAdapterInfo( void )
00729 {
00730     CD3DEnumDeviceInfo* pDeviceInfo;
00731     for( int i=0; i<deviceInfoList.GetSize(); i++ )
00732     {
00733         pDeviceInfo = deviceInfoList.GetAt(i);
00734         delete pDeviceInfo;
00735     }
00736     deviceInfoList.RemoveAll();
00737 }

00750     }

00755 //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00756 void CD3DEnumeration::ResetPossibleDepthStencilFormats()
00757 {
00758     m_DepthStecilPossibleList.RemoveAll();
00759     m_DepthStecilPossibleList.Add( D3DFMT_D16 );
00760     m_DepthStecilPossibleList.Add( D3DFMT_D15S1 );
00761     m_DepthStecilPossibleList.Add( D3DFMT_D24X8 );
00762     m_DepthStecilPossibleList.Add( D3DFMT_D24S8 );
00763     m_DepthStecilPossibleList.Add( D3DFMT_D24X4S4 );
00764     m_DepthStecilPossibleList.Add( D3DFMT_D32 );
00765 }
